snippet: The Jones Group said on Monday that it had ended efforts to sell its jeanswear unit to another apparel maker, Delta Galil of Israel, terminating a months-long process.
abstract: The Jones Group said on Monday that it had ended efforts to sell its jeanswear unit to another apparel maker, Delta Galil of Israel, terminating a months-long process.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Jones Group Calls Off Sale of Jeanswear Unit
